info.title: Tempo Budget
info.description: Tempo Budgets REST API documentation * **Warning!** The REST API is a work in progress and is subject to changes. Product updates may cause significant changes in function without advance warning. Note that Tempo Budgets is completely based on REST but not all of its methods are intended for external usage. You should use only methods that are listed in this API documentation.

errors.endDate: The start date must be before or equal to the end date

put.description: Updates an existing allocation (cost or consulting revenue).

errorMessages: A staff member must have at least one availability period

delete.description: Deletes an existing allocation (cost or consulting revenue).

put.description: Updates an existing consultant revenue billable hours.

delete.description: Deletes billable hours. Note that this will have no effect on worked hours that synchronized from the JIRA worklog or that are automatically calculated from the resource's allocation percentage. This method deletes only billable hours overrides entered either manually or programmatically.

example.error: Unable to unmarshal (to type [simple type, class java.lang.String]): Illegal date format: must be yyyy-MM-dd (through reference chain: com.tempoplugin.folio.web.rest.api.model.expense.PlannedRevenue["recurrence"]->com.tempoplugin.folio.web.rest.api.model.recurrence.Once["startDate"])

put.description: Updates an existing expense (cost or non-consulting revenue).

example.error: Unable to unmarshal (to type [simple type, class java.lang.String]): Illegal date format: must be yyyy-MM-dd (through reference chain: com.tempoplugin.folio.web.rest.api.model.expense.PlannedRevenue["recurrence"]->com.tempoplugin.folio.web.rest.api.model.recurrence.Once["startDate"])

post.description: Adds an expense (cost or non-consulting revenue) to a Folio.

errorMessages: The requested folio cannot be viewed because it either does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.

get.description: Retrieves an expense (cost or non-consulting revenue) by its ID

errorMessages: The requested folio cannot be viewed because it either does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.

delete.description: Deletes an expense (cost or non-consulting revenue).

get.description: Retrieves an expenses' payments (planned expense or revenue).
Retrieves summary information of all Folios that are visible to the user performing the request.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: set the maximum number of items returned. To be used in conjunction with offset for paginating results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: skips the number of records defined in the value. Offset will only be taken into account if the limit parameter is also informed

post.description: Creates and configures a new Folio

errorMessages: The requested folio cannot be viewed because it either does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.

get.description: Retrieves summary information of a Folio.
Retrieves the baselines of a Folio. This allows you to retrieve either planned costs or planned revenues baselines, or both.
get.operationId: Retrieve the baselines of a Folio

parameters.name: costs
parameters.description: Should return the planned costs baselines?

parameters.name: revenues
parameters.description: Should return the planned revenues baselines?

get.description: Retrieves the custom fields definitions of a Folio. This allows you to retrieve the unique ID of each custom field.
get.operationId: Retrieve the custom fields of a Folio

get.description: Retrieves expenditures of a Folio. Expenditures include both expenses and positions and both costs and revenues (client costs) that are not deleted. Query parameters allows you to select between costs or revenues and between planned or actuals. You can also specify the baseline ID of the expenses to retrieve. If no baseline ID is specified, then the latest version of the expenditures is returned.

parameters.name: baselineId
parameters.description: ID of the baseline.

parameters.name: actual
parameters.description: set to true to retrieve actual costs or revenues, false for planned.

parameters.name: revenue
parameters.description: set to true to retrieve revenues, false for costs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: set the maximum number of items returned. To be used in conjunction with offset for paginating results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: skips the number of records defined in the value. Offset will only be taken into account if the limit parameter is also informed

get.description: Retrieves expenses of a Folio. Expenses can include both costs and revenues (client costs) that are not deleted. Query parameters allows you to select between costs or revenues and between planned or actuals. You can also specify the baseline ID of the expenses to retrieve. If no baseline ID is specified, then the latest version of the expenses is returned.

parameters.name: baselineId
parameters.description: ID of the baseline.

parameters.name: actual
parameters.description: set to true to retrieve actual costs or revenues, false for planned.

parameters.name: revenue
parameters.description: set to true to retrieve revenues, false for costs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: set the maximum number of items returned. To be used in conjunction with offset for paginating results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: skips the number of records defined in the value. Offset will only be taken into account if the limit parameter is also informed

get.description: Retrieves positions of a Folio. Positions can include both costs and revenues (client costs) that are not deleted. Query parameters allows you to select between costs or revenues and between planned or actuals. You can also specify the baseline ID of the positions to retrieve. If no baseline ID is specified, then the latest version of the positions is returned.

parameters.name: baselineId
parameters.description: ID of the baseline.

parameters.name: actual
parameters.description: set to true to retrieve actual costs or revenues, false for planned.

parameters.name: revenue
parameters.description: set to true to retrieve revenues, false for costs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: set the maximum number of items returned. To be used in conjunction with offset for paginating results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: skips the number of records defined in the value. Offset will only be taken into account if the limit parameter is also informed

get.description: Retrieves the team of a Folio. The team of a folio is a list of team members or in other words, actual cost positions. The team potentially includes unassigned positions, if any.
get.operationId: Retrieve the team of a Folio

get.description: Retrieves the expense report data, allowing the user to group the data in serveral frequency formats.

expenditures.name: Bank loan
expenditures.description: Expected loan for initial cash flow

schema.description:
ACTUAL: Actual Cost
BUDGET: Planned Cost
PLANNED: Planned Revenue
REVENUE: Actual Revenue

get.description: Retrieves all overtime rules defined in FOLIO.

put.description: Updates an existing position (cost or consulting revenue). Planned positions can be either planned costs or revenues (distinguished by the boolean value in the "revenue" field. For actual positions (team members or actual consulting revenues), the member specified is the user key of the JIRA user to bind to the position. Set member to 'unassigned' for unassigned positions.

errorMesssages: The staff member must have at least one cost rate
The percentage or capacity is required

errors.name: Name is required
errors.weight: The percentage of the availability period is required
errors.effort: Worked hours must be a numeric value equals or greater than 0

post.description: Adds a position (planned position, consulting revenue or team member) to a Folio. Planned positions can be either planned costs or revenues (distinguished by the boolean value in the "revenue" field. For actual positions (team members or actual consulting revenues), the member specified is the user key of the JIRA user to bind to the position. Set member to 'unassigned' for unassigned positions.

errorMessages: The requested folio cannot be viewed because it either does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.

get.description: Retrieves a position (planned position, team member or consulting revenue) by its ID.

errorMessages: The requested folio cannot be viewed because it either does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.

delete.description: Deletes a position (planned cost, team member or consulting revenue).

errorMessages: Availability can only be added to staff members.

errors.endDate: The start date must be before or equal to the end date

post.description: Adds an allocation to a team position.
Adds billable hours to a consulting revenue.

get.description: Retrieves a position's payments (planned position, team member or consulting revenue).

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filters the payments by period. Must be used in conjunction with endDate. If it's before the folio period, uses the folio start date.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filters the payments by period. Must be used in conjunction with startDate. If it's after the folio period, uses the folio end date.

parameters.name: positionId
parameters.description: ID of the Position to retrieve

errors.startDate: A cost rate already exists with effective date (13/Nov/16)

post.description: Adds a rate/wage to a team position.
Adds worked hours to a team member.

errorMessages: The staff member must have at least one cost rate

errors.startDate: A cost rate already exists with effective date (14/Nov/16)

put.description: Updates an existing rate (cost or consulting revenue).

errorMessages: The staff member must have at least one cost rate

errors.startDate: A cost rate already exists with effective date (14/Nov/16)

put.description: Updates an existing team member worked hours.

delete.description: Deletes worked hours. Note that this will have no effect on worked hours that synchronized from the JIRA worklog or that are automatically calculated from the resource's allocation percentage. This method deletes only worked hours overrides entered either manually or programmatically.

otEffort.description: Number of overtime hours worked in period (format :####.##)

effort.description: Number of regular hours worked in period (format :####.##)

holidaySchemeId.description: ID of a default Tempo Holiday Scheme determining the non-working days of the team members of this Folio.

isSynchronizedWithWorkLogs.description: Does this Folio use JIRA work logs by default for calculating the actual effort of its team members?

withRevenue.description: Does this folio include revenues or not?

usesUserRates.description: Does this Folio use global user rates by default to calculate actual hourly cost of its team members?

withEarned.description: Does this folio use evm technique or not?

hoursPerDay.description: This parameter is not used anymore and will be empty for all Folios created since version 7.3.

revenuesAsClientCosts.description: ndicates if revenues included in this Folio should be considered as client costs. This implies a different status for revenue related performance indices. This is applicable only if withRevenue is true.

savedFilterId.description: ID of a valid JIRA saved filter associated with this Folio.

contingency.description: A positive number indicating the percentage of contingency, applied to the planned value to date of the Folio.

reserve.description: A positive number indicating the percentage of reserve, applied to the total budget of the Folio.

isSynchronizedWithTempoBilledHours.description: Does this Folio use Tempo billed hours by default for consulting revenues it contains? This is applicable only if withRevenue is true.

currencyCode.description: ISO 4217 Three letters currency code specifying the currency used for all amounts in this Folio.

tolerance.description: A positive number representing a percentage that provides a range of values for which performance indices turn amber, instead of red.

workloadSchemeId.description: ID of a default Tempo Workload Scheme determining the weekly work schedule of the team members of this Folio.

status.description: Read-only. determined by start date, end date and today's date.

teamRoleId.description: Tempo team role ID. This id has precedence over title and will override the title specified for this Position on PUT and POST operations, if any. If neither teamRoleId and title are specified, then the default Tempo Team Role will be assigned to this Position.

title.description: Position role. e.g. Developer, Quality Assurance, etc.

holidaySchemeId.description: ID of an associated Tempo Holiday Scheme, defining the position's holidays.

member.description: JIRA user key (or 'unassigned' if an unassigned team position)

workloadSchemeId.description: ID of an associated Tempo Workload Scheme, defining the position's weekly work schedule.

otEffort.description: Number of overtime hours worked in period (format :####.##)

effort.description: Number of regular hours worked in period (format :####.##)

ResponseBool.title: Response
ResponseBool.description: Success or error messages if any.

ResponseNumber.title: Response
ResponseNumber.description: Success or error messages if any.

ResponseExpense.title: Response
ResponseExpense.description: Success or error messages if any.

ResponseExpensePayments.title: Response
ResponseExpensePayments.description: Success or error messages if any.

totalAmount.description: Total amount of this payment, adding up amount and overtimeAmount, if any.

amount.description: The amount of this payment. If it is a payment for a Position, then it includes only the payment for regular hours.

overtimeAmount.description: Amount for overtime hours included in this payment.

rate.description: Cost rate used to calculate the payment.

totalEffort.description: Total effort included in this payment, adding up effort and overtimeEffort, if any.

overtimeEffort.description: Effort in overtime hours included in this payment.

effort.description: Effort in regular (non-overtime) hours included in this payment.

holidaySchemeId.description: ID of a default Tempo Holiday Scheme determining the non-working days of the team members of this Folio.

withRevenue.description: Does this folio include revenues or not?

workloadSchemeId.description: ID of a default Tempo Workload Scheme determining the weekly work schedule of the team members of this Folio.

status.description: Read-only. determined by start date, end date and today's date.
